title: T.J. Brown Summerset Abbey Spring Awakening (Book 03) (mobi epub
description:
Publication Date:August 6, 2013

The laughter of summer lawn parties fades for the men and women of Summerset Abbey, as the rumble of cannon-fire sweeps across Europe. In a changing world, they soon find that only one thing is certain: none of them will ever be the same.

victoria buxton 

The defiant suffragette raises eyebrows once again by living on her own in London as a lady bachelor. Kit Kittredge is the one man who understands and adores VictoriaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s fiery spiritÃ¢â‚¬â€but she rebuffs her best friendÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s offer of marriage time and again, choosing to join the war effort as a volunteer nurse. And on the battlefields of France, she will learn the true meaning of love and sacrifice. 

prudence tate 

After a stinging betrayal at Summerset Abbey, Prudence has found love and contentment in working-class Camden Town as Mrs. Andrew Wilkes. But when Andrew enlists, everything that Pru cherishes is at riskÃ¢â‚¬â€and she crosses a line attempting to protect him. Has she irreparably damaged their loving bond of trust?
